***HOW TO APPLY TO BE ON THE SOCIETY COUNCIL***

SEND AN EMAIL TO SISTER TOBLER rawlingsl@byui.edu INCLUDING THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION:

NAME__________

PHONE NUMBER______________

MAJOR___________

POSITION YOU ARE APPLYING FOR (INDICATE ALL THAT APPLY)___________________

You may indicate an order of interest if you would like.

WHAT YEAR ARE YOU IN SCHOOL? Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, Senior

Provide your responses to the following questions.

ANSWER ALL THESE QUESTIONS

  1. What experience have you had in the past?  What qualifications do you have?
  2. How do you feel you can benefit from being on the society?
  3. What strengths/abilities do you have that will be beneficial to the council’s success for the fall semester?

ANSWER 3 of the 5 QUESTIONs

  1. After having looked through what education society does and has done, what do you feel is most important event/service that education society offers?  Why?
  2. What do you hope education society can accomplish for the education majors next semester?  Why?
  3. Why is education important to you?
  4. What do you think is most important to get success in an organization (such as Ed Society)?
  5. What do you feel makes a great leader?  Why?

Last question: if you are not accepted to fill one of the positions you apply for, would you be interested in being a committee member next semester in education society?

 

After reviewing the applications, we may contact you further to ask 1-2 questions to get a better feel for who you are.  After the council has voted and has made a decision, we will extend an invitation to you to serve on the council.

Thank you for applying.
